importTagsetForm.invalidServerResponseInfo: The server returned an invalid response.
importTagsetForm.serverResponseInfo: The server returned the response below:
importTagsetForm.taggerImportError: An unknow error occurred while importing the tagset.
importTagsetForm.taggerImportErrorInfo1: An error occurred while importing the tagset:
importTagsetForm.taggerImportErrorInfo2: {nE} errors occurred while importing the tagset:
importTagsetForm.tagsetInfo: Note: A tagset file should be a text file containing one tag per line. In the case of POS tagsets dots will be interpreted as boundaries between POS and morph attributes. Tags that need correction should be preceded by a caret (^).

projectOptionsForm.assignUserInfo: Only admins and users assigned to the project can see and edit the project and the files it contains.
projectOptionsForm.associatedTagsetsInfo: When new texts are imported into this project they will by default be associated with the tagsets set here. Changing the settings here will **not** change any texts already in the database!

taggerOptionsForm.taggerOptionsInfo: You can only annotate texts using this tagger if they are associated at least with the tagsets selected here.

projectAdministration.deleteProjectInfo: Projects cannot be deleted as long as they contain any documents.
projectAdministration.visibleForAdmins: **Note**: Admins can _always_ see all project groups.

autoAnnotationForm.autoAnnotationInfo: "Annotate" replaces any annotations in lines **not** marked green in the progress area.

deleteToken.deletionPrompt: Are you sure you want to delete the token "{tok2del}"?

general.cannotSaveInfo: The process has been aborted as the document cannot be saved right now. Please check your internet connection and try again later.
general.couldNotLoadLines: An internal error occurred: Could not load lines {startLine} to {endLine}.
general.criticalErrorInfo: A server-side error occurred when saving the document. Please do not continue editing the file and contact an admin in order to prevent data loss.
general.primaryDataNotChanged: Original data have not been changed.
general.unsavedChangesWarning: There are unsaved changes that may be lost if you continue!

exportForm.exportInfoCora: Export a CorA XML-file containing the complete document including all annotations. The file can be reimported later on in order to obtain a version of the document identical to the file when exported.
exportForm.exportInfoCsv: Export a tab-delimited text file suitable for the import into spreadsheet software (e.g. Microsoft Excel). Please choose annotation layers to be exported:
exportForm.exportPrompt: Please choose a format for the export file:

import.chooseFile: Please choose a file to be imported!
import.importInfo: The fields below do not need to be filled if the information is included in the XML file.
import.importSuccessInfo: The file has been added to the project.
import.importUnknownError: Import failed due to unknown error!
import.noImportScriptInfo: There is no import script set for the selected project. Without an import script new documents can only be imported as CorA XML files.

columnLabels.closePrompt: You are about to close a file currently not worked on by yourself. If someone else is working on the file, data loss may occur. Continue anyway?
columnLabels.deleteWarning: Are you sure you want to delete the file '{file}'? This action cannot be undone!
columnLabels.noClose: You are not permitted to close this file.

FileTab.invalidServerResponseInfo: The server returned an invalid response. The file import may have failed.
FileTab.noFilesInProject: There are no files in this project.
FileTab.noProjectGroupsInfo: You have not been assigned to any project groups yet. Please contact an admin in order to get assigned to a project group.
FileTab.serverResponseInterpretation: An error occurred when interpreting the server response

Forms.msgFailedLogin: Login failed.  Please check your credentials.

confirmLogin.description: Please enter your credentials again to continue.
confirmLogin.title: Confirm login

Gui.loginAccessError: You've successfully logged in but you currently don't have access to the opened file. Another user might be working on the file.

uncaughtException.description: **An uncaught exception occurred.**  This should not have happened.  It is possible that you have to reload CorA to continue your work.

Help.title: Help
Help.paragraphGuide: Questions about the usage and functionality of CorA are covered in the user guide.
Help.paragraphFeedback: When reporting problems of any kind, please include a **detailed** description of the problem.  This includes the following information:
Help.contactCheck1: What **exactly** did you do when the problem occurred?
Help.contactCheck2: How does the problem manifest?  What exactly happens?  If there is an error message, please include it in your report!
Help.contactCheck3: Which file or which line did you work on when the problem occurred?
Help.paragraphAskAnAdmin: The first person to contact should always your **local server administrator**, i.e., the person who set up your CorA instance.
Help.paragraphUseTheIssueTracker: If you believe you've found a bug in CorA itself, or if there are any unresolved questions or feature requests, please use our **issue tracker.**
Help.dontShowAgain: Close and do not show again
Help.dontShowAgainInfo: You can always review the news by clicking on the 'Help' tab.

LibFile.invalidXML: The file does not contain valid XML. The parser reported:

passwordForm.doNotMatch: The passwords you entered do not match!
passwordForm.oldInvalid: The current password you entered is not correct!

ServerError.adminRequired: Administrator privileges are required for this action.
ServerError.fileTooBig: File exceeds the maximum allowed file size.
ServerError.nonZeroExit: The command returned the status code {code}.
ServerError.savedWithWarnings: Saving succeeded, but some information might not have been saved properly.
ServerError.utf8Failure: File could not be converted to UTF-8.  Please check whether you specified the correct encoding.

DocumentError.outOfColumnsForPage: No columns left while processing page '{id}'.
DocumentError.outOfLinesForColumn: No lines left while processing column '{id}'.
DocumentError.outOfDiplsForLine: No diplomatic tokens left while processing line '{id}'.
DocumentError.outOfPagesForColumn: No pages left to refer to column '{id}'.
DocumentError.outOfColumnsForLine: No columns left to refer to line '{id}'.
DocumentError.outOfLinesForDipl: No lines left to refer to diplomatic token '{id}'.
DocumentError.wrongDipl: Wrong diplomatic token for line '{line}' (expected: '{expected}'; found: '{found}').

cantUnlinkTagset.generic: Could not unlink tagsets from file.
cantUnlinkTagset.hasAnnotations: There are still {annotations} associated annotations for the tagset with ID {id}.  Tagsets that still have annotations associated with them cannot be unlinked via this GUI for safety reasons.

TranscriptionError.conversionFailed: An error occurred while converting the token.
TranscriptionError.lineCountMismatch: Token contains too many line breaks.
TranscriptionError.lineCountMismatchDetails: The new transcription contains {new} line breaks, while the previous one only had {old}.
TranscriptionError.lineBreakDangling: The new transcription contains one more line break than the previous one, but there is no matching line to associate with.  (Is this transcription in the last line of the document?)
TranscriptionError.lineBreakMisplaced: The new transcription contains one more line break than the previous one, but is not located at the end of a line.
TranscriptionError.wrongConverterOutput: The converter script returned invalid output.
TranscriptionError.wrongFile: File is not a text file and/or wrong encoding given.

XMLError.invalid: File does not contain well-formed XML.  Parser returned:
XMLError.noTextTag: XML format not recognized: no <text> tag found.
XMLError.missingNameAndID: The document has neither name nor a custom ID; using filename as document name.

AnnotationError.inProgress: A tagger for this project is already running.  Please wait a few moments and re-try this action.
